name: Chloe
review: Good for plucking eyebrows

name: Jessi
review: I love them, they grip really well and I love the design on them!

name: Kimmy
review: it grabs the hard to get hairs

name: Jules
review: I bought this same tweezer in the past and loved it. But this recent purchase of the exact same tweezer did not grip as well. Could not remove fine hairs.

name: Stella
review: It works great for the eyebrows, it gets all the small hairs.

name: MkupLady
review: This is a quality tool that will last forever until someone in my family steals it!

name: Holly G
review: I use these tweezers for stubborn body hairs. They were a little dull. It didn't really grab the hair like I expected it would.

name: Bobbie Jo
review: I use this product to shape my eyebrows and pluck away any unwanted hair. The greatest thing about the Revlon tweezers is how great they can grab even the tiniest hair, its amazing! There is not one thing I dislike about this product.

name: Mrs. Q ;)
review: Easy to use

name: Ash
review: I've bought more expensive tweezers in the past and after I found these I haven't looked back, they're a great price and they last! the only reason why I had to buy the last 2 is because I lost one after 2 years and I left one in Texas when I was visiting. they're great.

name: Misspriss
review: Worst tweezers I have ever used.

name: Lynn
review: Bought these tweezers and although they worked well, they fell off my counter onto the floor and the end bent. They no longer close completely due to this and it's not fixable. I have never had tweezers do this. I bought a second pair to give them one more chance.

name: Bluntly_Barbie
review: I love it, I'm able to grab my hairs with it so easy, and have no problem.

name: Cindy
review: I always but revlon tweezers. This is the first pair I don't like.  Tip is to sharp

name: Ang
review: There terrible worst I've ever bought and I paid more for them because of the pretty cover

name: sneakers
review: All too often products are mass produced and don't qualify for what their purpose is. Attempting to pluck hair from my brow with this is impossible.

name: Maggie
review: It's good to pluck multiple hairs, I have clumsy fat fingers and this user friendly

name: MB
review: Works great

name: Jendav6
review: I bought this to keep in my car and glad I did!

name: Cathy
review: I tweeze and they pull out hair. Promise  kept.

name: far and fid
review: With cream

name: Chris
review: Excellent product, no need to spend more on a similar product, this works just as good if not better.

name: Glitzy_Kelsey
review: I have crazy light blonde hair and I never could find a tweezer that could get my small fine hair without taking my skin with it. I love this!

name: Chirp
review: Not the best twizzers out there but they arent the worst and for the price you cant beat it

name: Oblong Polka Dot
review: I began buying Revlon tweezers in the late 90's and will continue to buy them. They are durable, easy to use and a great price!

name: M2
review: PERFECT IF IT CAME IN A SMALL SAC, SO CARRYING IT WOULD BE CONVENIENT.

name: JR
review: Accurate and gets the job done.

name: Michelllle317
review: When I bought these tweezers I was a little hesitant because the price was so reasonable.  After all was said and done I was pleasantly surprised on just how effective these low budget tweezers performed.

name: C in Cali
review: don't spend a penny more for tweezers! These are the Best!!! I know--I've bought many more for alot more $$$-----these are awesome!

name: Sans
review: I can't even use this product because it tears my sensitive eye area when I try to tweeze my eyebrows.

name: watch lady
review: The slanted tyweezers are great! They are easier and more accurate for eyebrow use.

name: Lindsey
review: Works great and isn't so sharp that it will stab you and draw blood like some tweezers.

name: BeautyFreak
review: They are pretty but also work really well. Glad I found these.

name: BeautyGirl
review: Love these, not to pricey and get the job done.

name: Annie
review: Awesome tool

name: Vern
review: I can only imagine a world in which I didn't need tweezers, they either work or they don't. I've gone through several pairs that look good but didn't work. These do the job and are nice looking. Good for brows and other areas of the face. Will grip thickers hairs like the brows, or thinner hair like the downy fuzz on the chin. I keep these in my car, and when I forget them it's depressing.

name: loveable love
review: It is a wonderful product love how its sharp it just perfect. It def.does its job.

name: Fishgoddess
review: Just once I wish I could buy a pair of tweezers that stayed aligned for more than a week.  It doesn't matter how much I baby them with care, (not just these Revlon tweezers), they always get out-of-whack and they are useless on my eyebrows. Ugh!

name: Tammy B
review: Great for even the thinnest/finest of hairs.  Did not cut off, but pulled out at root.  Easy to use slant tip.

name: Tabby303
review: It does the job as tweezing goes but i found the blunt tip to be difficult to work with when it came to fine hair or extracting a precise area

name: Lyn
review: I threw all old tweezers out .. except 2 of these. The best!

name: Jose
review: It is perfect

name: Hahahannah
review: I recently lost my tweezers and was devestated and my brows started growing wildly. I didn't want to spend too much money because I had school coming up but these tweezers are great and really get the pesky hairs.

name: kitty
review: Love these always works for those hairs your others can never get.  I was disappointed I n the color since I got pink flower ones and I thought I was getting red ... I hate pink and flowers lol

name: Rae
review: Perfect for keeping brows in shape!

name: Linda
review: Eyebrows

name: Felicia
review: Great tweezers for the price.

name: Mummum
review: Best think I bought so far.

name: Kat
review: On my eyebrows

name: Ash
review: It can be a little stiff at times, but it is a great multi-use product. You can use it for plucking your eyebrows, separating clumped lashes, etc.

name: Trinket Kim
review: same quality as the other brands at a lot better price.

name: Apes
review: I love how it picks out the smallest hairs that are usually the most difficult to grab.

name: BarbieNC
review: Thought I was buying the cheapest tweezers and when I got to the register found they were a bit more. I am happy that I made the mistake because these work great. They grab even the smallest bits!

name: celticfireraven
review: I LOVE this product's design. Also, love how its just as effective as the $25 tweezers on the market, but for a fraction of the price!

name: CHELS
review: LOVE THE PRODUCT

name: Outgoing1
review: I am obsessed with removing the hair on my face, and use tweezers every day.  I have tried other popular brands and return those and use the Revlon slant.  I rotate 4-5 tweezers at a time.

name: AlyD
review: they're just tweezers

name: Treble09
review: Revlon's brand of tweezers are hands down, the best I've ever used.  Personally I've never paid more than the 7 or 8 dollars for Revlon's brand tweezers, so I can't compare them to Tweezerman, but these slanted tip style are exactly what I need.  They grip on perfectly, and theres always a clean finish!  I buy this brand again and again.

name: Just me
review: These tweezers work really well. They have a good grip and the slant helps. I would recommend them to others.

name: MakeUpGirl
review: Works perfectly and quickly, you never have to try twice for hair plucking. love them!

name: tina
review: These tweezers were rather difficult to use. I couldn't really pull out ANY hair. I ended up buying another pair the next week.

name: Coupon Queen
review: Easy to use

name: Ruby
review: These tweezers work great and for the price, are just as good as the high dollar brands.

name: Renea
review: I have purchased 5-6 tweezers in the last year or so looking for one that would easily grab those little hairs that are so hard to get.  I haven't been satisfied with any of them; but this one works!  I just get my magnification mirror and start plucking; pretty soon my eyebrows look great! (and it's SO much cheaper than waxing or threading!)

name: Kimberli
review: Just buy it.

name: wackowoman
review: Great tweezer....price was in line with what I wanted to pay.

name: Damia Doll
review: I tried this product, I loved the style but that was it, the tips were uneven and couldn't even grasp an eyebrow hair with out it slipping through. Terribly ineffective. A problem that seems to never be solved it either works or it looks good, never both...

name: RO
review: They are very easy to handle.

name: wackowoman
review: easy to use....best I have found

name: Dawn
review: Very easy to use.

name: IK
review: They work great!

name: lola
review: works and good price. doesn't get the small haris to well but does its job

name: Roseanne
review: I love that it comes to a point!!

name: Jess
review: I need some new tweezers but I didn't want to spend $20 on them, since I often missplace them. I found these for a much better price and they work great, they do everything I need them to do and they are cute.
